content.body: {"theme":{"id":"theme","version":"1.0","startStage":"19e63b99-4c04-416a-8a9e-5d569742cd87","stage":[{"x":0,"y":0,"w":100,"h":100,"id":"19e63b99-4c04-416a-8a9e-5d569742cd87","rotate":null,"config":{"__cdata":"{\"opacity\":100,\"strokeWidth\":1,\"stroke\":\"rgba(255, 255, 255, 0)\",\"autoplay\":false,\"visible\":true,\"color\":\"#FFFFFF\",\"genieControls\":false,\"instructions\":\"\"}"},"manifest":{"media":[]},"org.ekstep.text":[{"x":10,"y":20,"minWidth":20,"w":35,"maxWidth":500,"fill":"#000000","fontStyle":"normal","fontWeight":"normal","stroke":"rgba(255, 255, 255, 0)","strokeWidth":1,"opacity":1,"editable":false,"version":"V2","offsetY":0.04,"h":50.22,"rotate":0,"textType":"text","lineHeight":1,"z-index":0,"font":"NotoSans","fontsize":48,"weight":"","id":"4736b78c-d606-4099-9d91-70e2c89a86ac","config":{"__cdata":"{\"opacity\":100,\"strokeWidth\":1,\"stroke\":\"rgba(255, 255, 255, 0)\",\"autoplay\":false,\"visible\":true,\"text\":\"The domestic cat (Felis silvestris catus or Felis catus)[1][4] is a small, typically furry, carnivorous mammal. They are often called house cats[5] when kept as indoor pets or simply cats when there is no need to distinguish them from other felids and felines. \",\"color\":\"#000000\",\"fontfamily\":\"NotoSans\",\"fontsize\":18,\"fontweight\":false,\"fontstyle\":false,\"align\":\"left\"}"}}]}],"manifest":{"media":[{"id":"c5a32292-a506-494e-a58a-0298637105d6","plugin":"org.ekstep.navigation","ver":"1.0","src":"/content-plugins/org.ekstep.navigation-1.0/renderer/controller/navigation_ctrl.js","type":"js"},{"id":"9db90bc9-a472-4c45-9921-0ea75464b898","plugin":"org.ekstep.navigation","ver":"1.0","src":"/content-plugins/org.ekstep.navigation-1.0/renderer/templates/navigation.html","type":"js"},{"id":"org.ekstep.navigation","plugin":"org.ekstep.navigation","ver":"1.0","src":"/content-plugins/org.ekstep.navigation-1.0/renderer/plugin.js","type":"plugin"},{"id":"org.ekstep.navigation_manifest","plugin":"org.ekstep.navigation","ver":"1.0","src":"/content-plugins/org.ekstep.navigation-1.0/manifest.json","type":"json"},{"id":"org.ekstep.text","plugin":"org.ekstep.text","ver":"1.2","src":"/content-plugins/org.ekstep.text-1.2/renderer/supertextplugin.js","type":"plugin"},{"id":"org.ekstep.text_manifest","plugin":"org.ekstep.text","ver":"1.2","src":"/content-plugins/org.ekstep.text-1.2/manifest.json","type":"json"}]},"plugin-manifest":{"plugin":[{"id":"org.ekstep.navigation","ver":"1.0","type":"plugin","depends":""},{"id":"org.ekstep.text","ver":"1.2","type":"plugin","depends":""}]},"compatibilityVersion":2}}
